title: Population of Greece 2016 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart representing Gender in the x axis and Total population in the y axis.
The Total population is appeared to be the highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The minimum Gender Males has got 2.06 times less Total population than the maximum Gender Total.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Gender, and Total population in each Gender on the y axis.
Gender Total has the highest Total population and Males has the lowest Total population.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Gender in the x axis and Total population in the y axis.
The Total population is appeared to be the highest at Gender Total and lowest at Gender Males.
The minimum Gender Males has got 2.06 times less Total population than the maximum Gender Total.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Gender in the x axis and Total population in the y axis.
The maximum Total population 10783748.0 is found at Gender Total and the minimum is found at Males where Total population is 5224210.0.
The second highest Total population is appeared to be the Gender .
Gender Males has 2.06 times less Total population than Gender Total which is the highest.
The highest value 10783748.0 at Total is almost 1.5 times larger than the average value 7189165.33.
The Total population is 21567496.0 if we add up values of all Genders.
